017package org.forgerock.openig.config.env;
018
019import java.io.File;
020
021import org.forgerock.openig.config.Environment;
022
023/**
024 * Reify the normal environment structure with pre-configured shortcuts.
025 * <pre>
026 *     conf/**.json
027 *     scripts/groovy/**.groovy
028 *     tmp/
029 * </pre>
030 *
031 * @since 2.2
032 */
033public class DefaultEnvironment implements Environment {
034
035    private final File base;
036
037    /**
038     * Builds a new file based {@link Environment} using the given file as the base directory.
039     * @param base OpenIG base directory
040     */
041    public DefaultEnvironment(final File base) {
042        this.base = base;
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public File getBaseDirectory() {
047        return base;
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public File getTempDirectory() {
052        return new File(base, "tmp");
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public File getScriptDirectory(final String type) {
057        return new File(new File(base, "scripts"), type);
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public File getConfigDirectory() {
062        return new File(base, "config");
063    }
064}
